title: Ep 97: Influenced by/with Lindsay Silberman
itunes:title: Ep 97: Influenced by/with Lindsay Silberman
itunes:subtitle: Hotel Lobby Candle founder and influencer Lindsay Silberman videos in to talk about what it’s like to have the “i-word” as a job title, how she created HLC during the pandemic, and the bra her boobs can’t live without. We also get into jeans, bodysuits...
description:
Hotel Lobby Candle founder and influencer Lindsay Silberman videos in to talk about what it’s like to have the “i-word” as a job title, how she created HLC during the pandemic, and the bra her boobs can’t live without. We also get into jeans, bodysuits, and how she tried really hard to take a break from her phone on her trip to Bora Bora. If you don’t follow Lindsay, you are missing out on one of my favorite follows of 2021!


Mentioned on the show:

  • Hotel Lobby Candle (the holiday collection is selling fast!): https://rstyle.me/cz-n/fwkc6udjdq7 
  • Skims Sculpting Bralette: https://rstyle.me/cz-n/fwkdmmdjdq7 
  • SALE ALERT: Abercrombie Curve Love 90s Ultra High Rise Straight Jeans: https://rstyle.me/cz-n/fwkdwndjdq7 
  • Target $12 Bodysuit: https://rstyle.me/cz-n/fvqaffdjdq7 
  • Wacoal Red Carpet Convertible Strapless Bra: https://rstyle.me/cz-n/fwkd7udjdq7
